template.header: Choose a template and let's get started on your next job-winning resume
template.body: Don't worry, you can always change your template later if you want to try something different.

basicInformation.header: To create the header of your resume, we need some basic information from you.
basicInformation.body: Please enter your address, the position you're applying for, your phone number, and your email address below.

jobExperience.header: Next, we need to know about your work experience.
jobExperience.body: Please provide details about your past jobs, including the name of the company, your job title, and your responsibilities and achievements. Here are some tips to help you write a great job history description:
tips: Focus on your accomplishments and achievements, rather than just listing your daily tasks.
Use specific examples and numbers to quantify your successes, such as 'Increased sales by 20% within 6 months'
Use bullet points to make your job history description easy to read and understand
Tailor your description to the job you're applying for, highlighting the skills and experiences that are most relevant
Avoid using generic phrases like 'responsible for' or 'duties included' - instead, focus on what you accomplished in each role
jobExperience.jobHighlight: What was your biggest achievement at your previous job?
jobExperience.jobBulletPoints: What other achievements or accomplishments do you want to include on your resume? Please list them below  separating each achievement by a new line.
